name: R5-SubstanceReferenceInformation-R4-SubstanceReferenceInformation
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 SubstanceReferenceInformation into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.comment` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.comment`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.contained`

R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene`

R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.gene` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.gene`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.geneSequenceOrigin` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.geneSequenceOrigin`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.id`

target.comment: R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.source` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.gene.source`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement.element` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement.element`

R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement.id`

target.comment: R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.geneElement.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

target.comment: R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.implicitRules`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.meta`

R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.amount[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.amount[x]`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.amountType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.amountType`

R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.id`
R5 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.interaction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `SubstanceReferenceInformation.target.interaction`
